query.statement:
UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST136 SET CS136_PST = #PST# ,UPDAT = HEX(CURRENT DATE) -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.30 Han J.H ,UPZET = HEX(CURRENT TIME) -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.30 Han J.H
,CS136_JAR = HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,CS136_SS1 = #G_USER_ID#
,CS136_JAR = HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,CS136_SS1 = #G_USER_ID# ,CS136_SDT = HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,CS136_APP = #G_USER_ID#
,CS136_JAR = '' ,CS136_SS1 = ''
,CS136_JAR = '' ,CS136_SS1 = '' ,CS136_SDT = '' ,CS136_APP = ''
WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136_GYM = #GYM# AND CS136_JYM = #JYM# AND CS136_UPN = #UPN# AND CS136_CST = #CST# AND CS136_PJT = #PJT# AND CS136_BSU = #BSU#
